attributes.action: RESIGN NOW.  It is time to GO!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Comrade, we are sick and tired of having an unelected Prime Minister. Your policies have driven the economy into the ground and the bullshine you keep spouting can no long be believed. Please RESIGN NOW. GO and Go NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
